description.msg2: I am passionate about programming and work on various projects on GitHub.
description.msg3: On my personal website, I publish my work and ideas, allowing visitors to peek into my world.
description.msg4: Also, on X (formerly Twitter), I share technical topics and daily events.
description.msg5: If you are interested in my activities, please check them out!
description.msg6: And please follow me on X (formerly Twitter) and GitHub!

description.msg1: Here, you can find various articles (or rather, blog posts) that I have written!
description.msg2: I write about a lot of things, so please take a look!

description.msg1: Here, you can listen to various music that I have produced!
description.msg2: Enjoy a wide variety of music!
